originalTitle: Flights to northern Ethiopia cancelled as fears mount of renewed conflict
title: Flights to northern Ethiopia cancelled as fears mount of renewed conflict
content: Passengers received a text message about the cancellation of flights, citing "unforeseen circumstances".

originalTitle: Melania Trump documentary not showing in South African cinemas
title: Melania Trump documentary not showing in South African cinemas
content: No reason has been given but the decision follows a huge fall-out between South Africa and the US.

originalTitle: 'The water took everything': Mozambique hit by worst floods in decades
title: 'The water took everything': Mozambique hit by worst floods in decades
content: Nearly 700,000 people have been affected by weeks of severe flooding in Mozambique

originalTitle: Israeli settler violence displaces Palestinians across occupied West Bank
title: Israeli settler violence displaces Palestinians across occupied West Bank
content: Israeli settler attacks across the occupied West Bank are forcing Palestinian communities to flee.

originalTitle: Airports embrace AI to manage growing global passenger traffic
title: Airports embrace AI to manage growing global passenger traffic
content: Airports use AI for passenger flow, baggage tracking and predictive maintenance to enhance efficiency and experience.

originalTitle: Inside Gaza after Israel’s last captive is found
title: Inside Gaza after Israel’s last captive is found
content: With the final Israeli captive returned, Palestinians are waiting to see if Israel will now implement a true ceasefire.

originalTitle: EU adds Iran's Revolutionary Guards to terrorist list
title: EU adds Iran's Revolutionary Guards to terrorist list
content: EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas says the move is a response to Tehran's deadly crackdown on protesters.

originalTitle: 'I can breathe again' says Israeli hostage held for nearly 500 days in Gaza
title: 'I can breathe again' says Israeli hostage held for nearly 500 days in Gaza
content: In his first international interview, Sasha Troufanov tells the BBC how he thought he would die in captivity after he was taken hostage on 7 October 2023.

originalTitle: France moves to abolish concept of marital duty to have sex
title: France moves to abolish concept of marital duty to have sex
content: The proposed bill would enshrine in law the end of so-called "conjugal rights" – the notion that marriage means a duty to have sex.

originalTitle: Palace agree £50m Strand Larsen deal as Forest chase Mateta
title: Palace agree £50m Strand Larsen deal as Forest chase Mateta
content: Crystal Palace agree a deal in principle worth in the region of £50m to sign Wolves striker Jorgen Strand Larsen.

originalTitle: How English clubs got smart to dominate this season's Champions League
title: How English clubs got smart to dominate this season's Champions League
content: Premier League clubs always had the money, but now they also have the know-how they have dominated this season's Champions League.

originalTitle: Why Holland could be key to Man Utd's revival under Carrick
title: Why Holland could be key to Man Utd's revival under Carrick
content: Why former England and Chelsea coach Steve Holland could be the key appointment in new boss Michael Carrick's coaching team at Manchester United.
